idea:
Macmerise Celfie Design Private Limited is pioneering the concept of getting your picture inserted with Celebrities on accessories. We are the only brand of its kind which not only has license for celebrities like Mr. Bachchan but also has created templates of celebrities' images with blank spaces for inserting your own photo on accessories like Phone and Tablet Covers, Laptop Skins, Power banks, Headphones, Chargers, Mugs, T-shirts,etc. This gives fans who are our customers, the opportunity to literally be in the same frame as their heroes/heroines/sportstars and the entire process is online and automated.

This unique idea has now gained traction and a major part of our sales are now for customised products. We are the only company in India which has been pursuing Bollywood IPs and celebrities and has been making merchandised products around those properties, for.e.g. movies like Jab Harry Met Sejal, Baaghi2, Queen, Zero, GullyBoy,etc. This concept has given us a distinct identity in the startup ecosystem and we are now going to do even more such licensing tie-ups going ahead, thereby giving us a unique business model.
name: MACMERISE CELFIE DESIGN PRIVATE LIMITED
